text: I need precise instructions to know what is expected of me
An individual should prioritize group's interest to her/his own
I think that handling money carefully is of utmost importance
My primary goal in decision making is to achieve the best results, regardless of whether I will outshine others by that
It is not desirable for managers to often consult lower-ranked employees
Following rules and procedures is crucial for good work
Even in difficult times, people should remain loyal to their group
For me, it is greatly important to persist even when I am facing resistance
In the decision making process, people's feelings are not an important factor
Rules and regulations help me greatly to know what is expected of me
Group's progress is more important than individuals' standing out
The effect of decisions on people's feelings and relationships does not matter to me.
Standardized procedures make work easier
Team success is much more preferable than individual's success
Long-term planning is of utmost importance to me
I'm extra satisfied when my decisions yield better results than the results my colleagues achieved.
Important tasks and commitments should not be delegated to lower-ranked employees
Clear procedures are crucial in successfull accomplishment of the task
Before one commits to one's own goals, she/he should consider how they would affect the group
I am ready to give up fun today for the sake of future success
Loyalty to the group should be encouraged even when it collides with personal goals
Hard work for future success is greatly important to me.
